prev.html:
I did some home-mixing tonight for the first time since moving in with Lauren.

I mix music; Gatsby sends mixed signals.

next.html: Suffice it to say, I'm in a new glockenspiel band with Mike 2600. Mike and I had our first practice tonight and it went very well. We'll have our debut at the Triple Rock Social Club in a while when we have it together.
